text: Tabi ki e ma baa wi pe: “Dajudaju Won iba so Tira kale fun wa ni, awa iba mona ju won lo.” Eri t’o yanju, imona ati ike kuku ti de ba yin lati odo Oluwa yin. Nitori naa, ta ni o se abosi ju eni t’o pe awon ayah Allahu niro, t’o tun gbunri kuro nibe? A maa san awon t’o n gbunri kuro nibi awon ayah Wa ni (esan) iya buruku nitori pe won n gbunri (kuro nibe)
